list.name: CHUNKS
list.query: kubernetes.pod_name:"s1pro-ingestion-xbip*worker*" AND task.event:END AND task.name:IngestionWorker AND task.status:NOK

list.name: AUX
list.query: kubernetes.pod_name:"s1pro-ingestion-auxip*worker" AND task.event:END AND task.name:IngestionWorker AND task.status:NOK

options.content: RS core Ingestion

panels.description: Average and rate are computed ONLY on task with status OK.

targets.query: task.event:END AND task.name:IngestionTrigger AND task.status:OK AND kubernetes.pod_name:"s1pro-ingestion-auxip-trigger*"

panels.title: IngestionTrigger AUXIP duration
